panels.description: RoundVotingPowerPercent is the percentage of the total voting power received with a round. The value begins at 0 for each round and approaches 1.0 as additional voting power is observed. The metric is labeled by vote type.
panels.title: Consensus Round Voting Power Percent

panels.description: ProposalCreationCount is the total number of proposals created by this node since process start. The metric is annotated by the status of the proposal from the application, either 'accepted' or 'rejected'.
panels.title: Proposal Create Count

panels.description: ProposalReceiveCount is the total number of proposals received by this node since process start. The metric is annotated by the status of the proposal from the application, either 'accepted' or 'rejected'.
panels.title: Proposal Receive Count

panels.description: Interval in seconds between the proposal timestamp and the timestamp of the earliest prevote that achieved a quorum.
panels.title: Quorum Prevote Delay

panels.description: Number of validators who did not sign.
panels.title: Missing Validators

panels.description: Number of validators who tried to double sign.
panels.title: Byzantine Validator Count

panels.description: Interval in seconds between the proposal timestamp and the timestamp of the latest prevote in a round where all validators voted.
panels.title: Full Prevote Delay
